field.label: Serial Key
field.comment: Your can find Serial Key in your account at store.plumrocket.com. For manual click here.

field.label: Replace Templates
field.comment: Set "Yes" to replace your customer login/registration template with this extension template and display the social login buttons automatically. Please see our online documentation if you want to keep your own template and install social buttons manually.

field.label: Display on Login Form
field.comment: Display Social Login buttons on magento customer login form

field.label: Display on Registration Form
field.comment: Display Social Login buttons on magento customer registration form

field.label: Ignore Missing Data from Social Networks
field.comment: Many (but not all) social networks share only limited user profile/personal information. If this option is enabled, all required fields in magento that are missing will be pre-filled with temporary data to speed-up the registration process. If this option is set to "No" - the user will be sent to the registration form to enter missing info.

field.label: Subscribe Customer To Email Newsletter
field.comment: Automatically sign up customer to the Newsletter Subscribers list during the registration

field.label: Display Customer Photo
field.comment: Display customer photo from social network in your website header. Please see our online documentation for manual installation instructions if the photo is not shown.

field.label: Login Success Page
field.comment: User will be redirected to this page after each successful login

field.label: Login Custom Success Page URL
field.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name, to which you will be redirecting.

field.label: Registration Success Page
field.comment: User will be redirected to this page after successful registration

field.label: Registration Custom Success Page URL
field.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name, to which you will be redirecting.
Visible buttons will be displayed by default. Hidden buttons will be listed under "show more" section in the front-end.

field.label: Enable
field.comment: Display social share popup after successfull user registration

field.label: Share Page
field.comment: Selected page of your store will be shared on social networks.

field.label: Custom Share Page URL
field.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name.

field.label: Enable logging
field.comment: Enable logging of all errors returned by the social media networks and services

field.label: Download Log File
field.comment: The log is located at: /var/log/pslogin.log

field.label: Enable
field.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to associate their magento account with more than one social network account. Example: user will be able to login to the same store account with Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, etc.

field.label: Description
field.comment: This text will be displayed in customer account -> my social accounts tab as well as in social accounts popup.

field.label: Enable Popup
field.comment: If enabled, customers will see a popup window allowing to connect new social network to their magento store account.

field.label: Popup Cookie Timeout (days)
field.comment: If popup was closed it will be displayed again to the same user in specified number of days. Enter "0" to never display popup again after it was closed first time.

field.label: Enable
field.comment: For configuration instructions, please click here.

field.label: OAuth Redirect URI
field.comment: This URL should be used while creating new social login application. Please make sure your site has SSL enabled as "https" protocol is required for this network.

field.label: Ask for Birthday
field.comment: Request customer's birthday date from Facebook
